---
title: SFTP
description: Steps for pulling server files to local machine via sftp
author: Caleb Grant
date: 2023-07-07
categories: [Linux]
---

1. Allow secure connection for local IP on remote machine

    ```sh
    sudo ufw allow from 73.239.143.170 to any port 22
    ```

1. Create SFTP connection to remote from local machine

   ```sh
   sftp hostname@167.99.102.213
   sftp hostname@167.99.102.213's password: SuperSecret
   ```

1. Pull remote files to local machine

    ```sh
    get {remote-path} {local-path}
    ```
